name: Jong Tae Lim
title: President
profile:
□ Major: Ph. D. in Photonics Physics
        (Nano structures of semiconductors) 
□ Experience
- ‘14~Present : Mentor for incubating startups

  Innovation)

            in Visual Display Division

           in Visual Display Division

          Sandia National Laboratories in US
